result.purpose: Responsible for managing a pool of worker goroutines to process jobs concurrently.
result.architecture: The folder follows a concurrent architecture pattern, utilizing goroutines for job processing and management.

pkg/worker/config.go.purpose: Defines the configuration structure for the worker package.

pkg/worker/dispatcher.go.purpose: Implements a dispatcher for managing a pool of worker goroutines to process jobs concurrently.

pkg/worker/job.go.purpose: Defines a Job struct that holds a function to be executed.

pkg/worker/worker.go.purpose: Defines a Worker struct that manages job execution in a concurrent worker pool.
